entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
